name: NIntendo Collision File
summary: Learn about .KCL files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Most gamers will not see KCL files or need to open them unless they are looking to modify gameplay. Modders can open KCL files with MKDS Course Modifier and the KCL editor included with CTools. By editing KCL files, modders can change various interactions, such as how the karts interact with the physical constraints of the course (i.e., walls or track floors) or whether a character can walk through walls.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
